entry.title: Turkey‚Äôs special representative proposes trip to Yerevan next week

media:group.media:title: Turkey‚Äôs special representative proposes trip to Yerevan next week
media:group.media:description:
üìç Turkey‚Äôs special representative to Armenia offered to visit Yerevan next week to continue normalization talks between the two countries. üìç Nagorno-Karabakh was ranked as the least free place in the entire world by Freedom House following its takeover last year by Azerbaijan. üìç Armenia‚Äôs ambassador-at-large resigned due to differences with the government over the country‚Äôs foreign policy. üìç Armenia‚Äôs parliament speaker suggested the country should seek EU membership as ties with Russia continue to worsen.

entry.title: Assessing the French defense minister‚Äôs visit to Armenia

media:group.media:title: Assessing the French defense minister‚Äôs visit to Armenia
media:group.media:description:
This week's episode of Insights with Eric Hacopian examines significant diplomatic and historical developments in France and Armenia. Eric will discuss the visit of the French defense minister to Armenia and the internment of resistance heroes Missak Manouchian and Meline Assadourian. He will also explore the recent arrest and release of an Azeri war criminal in Moscow.
